tasks.title: Setup dashboard project structure
tasks.description: Create dashboard folder with index.html, server.js, package.json, and subdirectories for modules, api, and config
tasks.details: Create D:/VarnaAI/Websites/dashboard/ with proper folder structure for a modern SaaS control panel. Include Tailwind CSS setup and Express.js backend configuration.

tasks.title: Create main dashboard UI layout
tasks.description: Build index.html with Tailwind CSS classes for modern SaaS dashboard with sidebar, main content area, and status bar
tasks.details: Use color palette: Primary Blue #0066cc, Purple Gradient #667eea to #764ba2, Dark #2d3748, Success Green #48bb78, Alert Red #ff6b6b. Create responsive grid layout with dark theme.

tasks.title: Build WordPress control panel section
tasks.description: Create WordPress management section with login buttons for all 5 sites, page tracker, and SEO score monitoring
tasks.details: Add quick login buttons using stored credentials from CLAUDE.md. Display page creation status (4/35 pages), average SEO score, and site health indicators.

tasks.title: Implement content generation hub
tasks.description: Build AI content generator section with blog post, social media, and email campaign creation
tasks.details: Support DE/EN/BG languages. Include tone selection (professional/casual). Connect to OpenAI or Claude API for generation.

tasks.title: Create marketing automation panel
tasks.description: Build marketing section with Mailchimp email lists, Buffer social scheduling, and campaign launcher
tasks.details: Integrate existing marketing-machine APIs. Show subscriber count, scheduled posts, active campaigns. Add buttons for launching campaigns and scheduling social blasts.

tasks.title: Setup Express.js backend server
tasks.description: Create server.js with API endpoints for tool execution, credential management, and external API connections
tasks.details: Setup Express server with endpoints for WordPress login, content generation, marketing automation, and analytics. Include secure credential storage and session management.

tasks.title: Build analytics monitoring dashboard
tasks.description: Create real-time analytics section with GA4 integration, visitor tracking, and performance metrics
tasks.details: Display today's visitors, leads, keyword rankings, social engagement, email open rates. Use Chart.js for data visualization. Connect to Google Analytics API.

tasks.title: Implement quick actions panel
tasks.description: Create one-click operations panel for common tasks like batch content generation and bulk posting
tasks.details: Add buttons for: Generate complaint letter, Create WordPress page, Run SEO audit, Export analytics, Clear cache, Check broken links.
